companyDescription: Product management platform and developer productivity solutions for engineering teams

businessFunctions.description: Transforms engineering data into actionable insights, automates documentation, and accelerates incident response
AI writing assistant converts PRDs and tech specs into marketing-grade announcements
Automated updates reduce meeting time and provide shared context without manual preparation

implementation.approach: ETL platform with Claude managing data pipelines, integrated with GitHub, Jira, and Linear

quantitativeMetrics.source: Teams using Graph with Claude in Amazon Bedrock have achieved: 5x faster incident identification for site reliability engineering (SRE) teams
50% reduction in meeting time through personalized, automated updates

quantitativeMetrics.context: Generation of customized release notes and technical docs
quantitativeMetrics.source: Generation of customized release notes and technical docs in seconds

qualitativeBenefits.description: Enables managers to oversee larger teams while maintaining quality leadership
qualitativeBenefits.source: Many engineering managers who previously oversaw teams of five now manage fifteen, yet still need to deliver the same quality of leadership and results

qualitativeBenefits.description: Claude enabled LaunchNotes to confidently enter an entirely new market
qualitativeBenefits.source: Without Claude, we might not have felt confident enough to take the bet on Graph... Claude has literally enabled us, as a business, to attack an entirely new market opportunity

qualitativeBenefits.description: Helps engineering managers anticipate and prevent problems before escalation
qualitativeBenefits.source: Our goal is to help engineering managers anticipate and prevent problems before they escalate
